mapper.select: SELECT CAST(es.id AS CHAR) AS id, es.name, CAST(es.date AS CHAR) AS date, es.shift, f.uuid, CAST(es.priority AS CHAR) AS priority FROM elec_shift es INNER JOIN friend f ON es.id = f.id WHERE es.priority IN (1,2) AND (DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),"%Y-%m-%d")=DATE_FORMAT(es.date,"%Y-%m-%d")) ORDER BY es.priority;
